rooms.description: Two-car garage divided into two sections with eco-friendly insulation and low-emission concrete.
Central living space with energy-efficient LED lighting and large south-facing windows for natural light per Vastu guidelines. Eco-friendly materials used.
Compact, functional kitchen with water-saving fixtures and energy-efficient appliances. Designed to ensure proper air circulation as per local norms.

openings.description: Reinforced door with recycled materials and energy-efficient design ensuring proper north-east positioning for prosperity.
South facing window designed to maximize natural lighting and ventilation, aligned with Vastu principles.

rooms.description: spacious bedroom with eco-friendly flooring and natural ventilation windows on the east side in accordance with Vastu.
Additional bedroom featuring minimalistic design and energy-efficient cooling solutions.
Compact bathroom with water-saving fixtures and proper north positioning as advised by Vastu for health and wellness.

openings.description: East-facing window to promote positive energy flow and enhance natural light during morning hours.
Window ensuring cross ventilation in the bathroom area, placed according to local building norms.
